title: Align
introductionEN: A widget that aligns its child within itself and optionally sizes itself based on the child's size.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它将其子项与其自身对齐，并根据子级的大小自行调整大小。
constructors: Align({Key? key, AlignmentGeometry alignment, double? widthFactor, double? heightFactor, Widget? child})

title: AspectRatio
introductionEN: A widget that attempts to size the child to a specific aspect ratio.
introductionCN: 尝试将子项调整为特定宽高比的小部件。
constructors: AspectRatio({Key? key, required double aspectRatio, Widget? child})

title: Baseline
introductionEN: A widget that positions its child according to the child's baseline.
introductionCN: 根据孩子的基线定位孩子的小部件。
constructors: Baseline({Key? key, required double baseline, required TextBaseline baselineType, Widget? child})

title: Center
introductionEN: A widget that centers its child within itself.
introductionCN: 一个小孩，它将孩子置于其中心。
constructors: Center({Key? key, double? widthFactor, double? heightFactor, Widget? child})

title: ConstrainedBox
introductionEN: A widget that imposes additional constraints on its child.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，对其子级施加额外的约束。
constructors: ConstrainedBox({Key? key, required BoxConstraints constraints, Widget? child})

title: Container
introductionEN: A convenience widget that combines common painting, positioning, and sizing widgets.
introductionCN: 一个便利的小部件，结合了常见的绘画，定位和大小调整小部件。
constructors: Container({Key? key, AlignmentGeometry? alignment, EdgeInsetsGeometry? padding, Color? color, Decoration? decoration, Decoration? foregroundDecoration, double? width, double? height, BoxConstraints? constraints, EdgeInsetsGeometry? margin, Matrix4? transform, AlignmentGeometry? transformAlignment, Widget? child, Clip clipBehavior})

title: CustomSingleChildLayout
introductionEN: A widget that defers the layout of its single child to a delegate.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，将其单个子级的布局推迟到委托。
constructors: CustomSingleChildLayout({Key? key, required SingleChildLayoutDelegate delegate, Widget? child})

title: Expanded
introductionEN: A widget that expands a child of a Row, Column, or Flex.
introductionCN: 用于展开Row，Column或Flex的子项的窗口小部件。
constructors: Expanded({Key? key, int flex = 1, required Widget child})

title: FittedBox
introductionEN: Scales and positions its child within itself according to fit.
introductionCN: 根据合适的尺度对孩子进行缩放和定位。
constructors: FittedBox({Key? key, BoxFit fit, AlignmentGeometry alignment, Clip clipBehavior, Widget? child})

title: FractionallySizedBox
introductionEN: A widget that sizes its child to a fraction of the total available space. For more details about the layout algorithm, see RenderFractionallySizedOverflowBox.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，可将其子级调整为总可用空间的一小部分。有关布局算法的更多详细信息，请参阅RenderFractionallySizedOverflowBox。
constructors: FractionallySizedBox({Key? key, AlignmentGeometry alignment, double? widthFactor, double? heightFactor, Widget? child})

title: IntrinsicHeight
introductionEN: A widget that sizes its child to the child's intrinsic height.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，可以将其子级调整为子级的内在高度。
constructors: IntrinsicHeight({Key? key, Widget? child})

title: IntrinsicWidth
introductionEN: A widget that sizes its child to the child's intrinsic width.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它将子级的大小调整为子级的内部宽度。
constructors: IntrinsicWidth({Key? key, double? stepWidth, double? stepHeight, Widget? child})

title: LimitedBox
introductionEN: A box that limits its size only when it's unconstrained.
introductionCN: 只有当它不受约束时才限制其大小的盒子。
constructors: LimitedBox({Key? key, double maxWidth, double maxHeight, Widget? child})

title: Offstage
introductionEN: A widget that lays the child out as if it was in the tree, but without painting anything, without making the child available for hit testing, and without taking any room in the parent.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它将孩子放在树中，但不会绘制任何东西，不会让孩子可用于命中测试，也不会占用父母的任何空间。
constructors: Offstage({Key? key, bool offstage, Widget? child})

title: OverflowBox
introductionEN: A widget that imposes different constraints on its child than it gets from its parent, possibly allowing the child to overflow the parent.
introductionCN: 一个小部件对其子级施加不同于从其父级获得的约束，可能允许子级溢出父级。
constructors: OverflowBox({Key? key, AlignmentGeometry alignment, double? minWidth, double? maxWidth, double? minHeight, double? maxHeight, Widget? child})

title: Padding
introductionEN: A widget that insets its child by the given padding.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它通过给定的填充来保护其子级。
constructors: Padding({Key? key, required EdgeInsetsGeometry padding, Widget? child})

title: SizedBox
introductionEN: A box with a specified size. If given a child, this widget forces its child to have a specific width and/or height (assuming values are permitted by this widget's parent). If either the width or height is null, this widget will size itself to match the child's size in that dimension.
introductionCN: 具有指定大小的框。 如果给定一个子节点，则此小部件会强制其子节点具有特定的宽度和/或高度（假设此小部件的父节点允许值）。 如果宽度或高度为null，则此窗口小部件将自行调整大小以匹配该维度中子项的大小。
constructors: SizedBox({Key? key, double? width, double? height, Widget? child})

title: SizedOverflowBox
introductionEN: A widget that is a specific size but passes its original constraints through to its child, which will probably overflow.
introductionCN: 一个特定大小的窗口小部件，但将其原始约束传递给它的子节点，这可能会溢出。
constructors: SizedOverflowBox({Key? key, required Size size, AlignmentGeometry alignment, Widget? child})

title: Transform
introductionEN: A widget that applies a transformation before painting its child.
introductionCN: 在绘制其子项之前应用转换的窗口小部件。
constructors: Transform({Key? key, required Matrix4 transform, Offset? origin, AlignmentGeometry? alignment, bool transformHitTests, Widget? child})

title: Column
introductionEN: Layout a list of child widgets in the vertical direction.
introductionCN: 在垂直方向上布置子窗口小部件列表。
constructors: Column({Key? key, MainAxisAlignment mainAxisAlignment = MainAxisAlignment.start, MainAxisSize mainAxisSize = MainAxisSize.max, CrossAxisAlignment crossAxisAlignment = CrossAxisAlignment.center, TextDirection? textDirection, VerticalDirection verticalDirection = VerticalDirection.down, TextBaseline? textBaseline, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[]})

title: CustomMultiChildLayout
introductionEN: A widget that uses a delegate to size and position multiple children.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它使用委托来调整和定位多个子节点。
constructors: CustomMultiChildLayout({Key? key, required MultiChildLayoutDelegate delegate, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[]})

title: Flow
introductionEN: A widget that implements the flow layout algorithm.
introductionCN: 实现流布局算法的小部件。
constructors: Flow({Key? key, required FlowDelegate delegate, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[], Clip clipBehavior})

title: GridView
introductionEN: A grid list consists of a repeated pattern of cells arrayed in a vertical and horizontal layout. The GridView widget implements this component.
introductionCN: 网格列表由以垂直和水平布局排列的重复单元格图案组成。 GridView小部件实现此组件。
constructors: GridView({Key? key, Axis scrollDirection = Axis.vertical, bool reverse = false, ScrollController? controller, bool? primary, ScrollPhysics? physics, bool shrinkWrap = false, EdgeInsetsGeometry? padding, required SliverGridDelegate gridDelegate, bool addAutomaticKeepAlives = true, bool addRepaintBoundaries = true, bool addSemanticIndexes = true, double? cacheExtent, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[], int? semanticChildCount, DragStartBehavior dragStartBehavior = DragStartBehavior.start, Clip clipBehavior = Clip.hardEdge, ScrollViewKeyboardDismissBehavior keyboardDismissBehavior = ScrollViewKeyboardDismissBehavior.manual, String? restorationId})

title: IndexedStack
introductionEN: A Stack that shows a single child from a list of children.
introductionCN: 一个堆栈，显示来自子列表的单个子项。
constructors: IndexedStack({Key? key, AlignmentGeometry alignment = AlignmentDirectional.topStart, TextDirection? textDirection, StackFit sizing = StackFit.loose, int? index, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[]})

title: LayoutBuilder
introductionEN: Builds a widget tree that can depend on the parent widget's size.
introductionCN: 构建可依赖于父窗口小部件大小的窗口小部件树。
constructors: LayoutBuilder({Key? key, required LayoutWidgetBuilder builder})

title: ListBody
introductionEN: A widget that arranges its children sequentially along a given axis, forcing them to the dimension of the parent in the other axis.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它沿着给定的轴顺序排列子节点，强制它们到另一个轴的父节点的维度。
constructors: ListBody({Key? key, Axis mainAxis, bool reverse, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[]})

title: ListView
introductionEN: A scrollable, linear list of widgets. ListView is the most commonly used scrolling widget. It displays its children one after another in the scroll direction. In the cross axis, the children are required to fill the ListView.
introductionCN: 可滚动的线性小部件列表。 ListView是最常用的滚动小部件。它在滚动方向上一个接一个地显示它的子项。在横轴中，子项需要填充ListView。
constructors: ListView({Key? key, Axis scrollDirection = Axis.vertical, bool reverse = false, ScrollController? controller, bool? primary, ScrollPhysics? physics, bool shrinkWrap = false, EdgeInsetsGeometry? padding, double? itemExtent, bool addAutomaticKeepAlives = true, bool addRepaintBoundaries = true, bool addSemanticIndexes = true, double? cacheExtent, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[], int? semanticChildCount, DragStartBehavior dragStartBehavior = DragStartBehavior.start, ScrollViewKeyboardDismissBehavior keyboardDismissBehavior = ScrollViewKeyboardDismissBehavior.manual, String? restorationId, Clip clipBehavior = Clip.hardEdge})

title: Row
introductionEN: Layout a list of child widgets in the horizontal direction.
introductionCN: 在水平方向上布置子窗口小部件列表。
constructors: Row({Key? key, MainAxisAlignment mainAxisAlignment = MainAxisAlignment.start, MainAxisSize mainAxisSize = MainAxisSize.max, CrossAxisAlignment crossAxisAlignment = CrossAxisAlignment.center, TextDirection? textDirection, VerticalDirection verticalDirection = VerticalDirection.down, TextBaseline? textBaseline, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[]})

title: Stack
introductionEN: This class is useful if you want to overlap several children in a simple way, for example having some text and an image, overlaid with a gradient and a button attached to the bottom.
introductionCN: 如果要以简单的方式重叠多个子项，此类很有用，例如，具有一些文本和图像，覆盖有渐变和附加到底部的按钮。
constructors: Stack({Key? key, AlignmentGeometry alignment, TextDirection? textDirection, StackFit fit, @Deprecated('Use clipBehavior instead. See the migration guide in flutter.dev/go/clip-behavior. ' 'This feature was deprecated after v1.22.0-12.0.pre.') Overflow overflow, Clip clipBehavior, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[]})

title: Table
introductionEN: A widget that uses the table layout algorithm for its children.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它为其子节点使用表格布局算法。
constructors: Table({Key? key, List<TableRow> children, Map<int, TableColumnWidth>? columnWidths, TableColumnWidth defaultColumnWidth, TextDirection? textDirection, TableBorder? border, TableCellVerticalAlignment defaultVerticalAlignment, TextBaseline? textBaseline})

title: Wrap
introductionEN: A widget that displays its children in multiple horizontal or vertical runs.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，以多个水平或垂直运行方式显示其子项。
constructors: Wrap({Key? key, Axis direction, WrapAlignment alignment, double spacing, WrapAlignment runAlignment, double runSpacing, WrapCrossAlignment crossAxisAlignment, TextDirection? textDirection, VerticalDirection verticalDirection, Clip clipBehavior, List<Widget> children = const <Widget>[]})

title: CupertinoSliverNavigationBar
introductionEN: An iOS-styled navigation bar with iOS-11-style large titles using slivers.
introductionCN: 一个 iOS 风格的导航栏，带有使用条子的 iOS-11 风格的大标题。
constructors: CupertinoSliverNavigationBar({Key? key, Widget? largeTitle, Widget? leading, bool automaticallyImplyLeading, bool automaticallyImplyTitle, String? previousPageTitle, Widget? middle, Widget? trailing, Border? border, Color? backgroundColor, Brightness? brightness, EdgeInsetsDirectional? padding, bool transitionBetweenRoutes, Object heroTag, bool stretch})

title: CustomScrollView
introductionEN: A ScrollView that creates custom scroll effects using slivers.
introductionCN: 使用 slivers 创建自定义滚动效果的 ScrollView。
constructors: CustomScrollView({Key? key, Axis scrollDirection = Axis.vertical, bool reverse = false, ScrollController? controller, bool? primary, ScrollPhysics? physics, ScrollBehavior? scrollBehavior, bool shrinkWrap = false, Key? center, double anchor = 0.0, double? cacheExtent, List<Widget> slivers, int? semanticChildCount, DragStartBehavior dragStartBehavior = DragStartBehavior.start, ScrollViewKeyboardDismissBehavior keyboardDismissBehavior = ScrollViewKeyboardDismissBehavior.manual, String? restorationId, Clip clipBehavior = Clip.hardEdge})

title: SliverAppBar
introductionEN: A material design app bar that integrates with a CustomScrollView.
introductionCN: 与 CustomScrollView 集成的材料设计应用栏。
constructors: SliverAppBar({Key? key, Widget? leading, bool automaticallyImplyLeading, Widget? title, List<Widget>? actions, Widget? flexibleSpace, PreferredSizeWidget? bottom, double? elevation, Color? shadowColor, bool forceElevated, Color? backgroundColor, Color? foregroundColor, Brightness? brightness, IconThemeData? iconTheme, IconThemeData? actionsIconTheme, TextTheme? textTheme, bool primary, bool? centerTitle, bool excludeHeaderSemantics, double? titleSpacing, double? collapsedHeight, double? expandedHeight, bool floating, bool pinned, bool snap, bool stretch, double stretchTriggerOffset, AsyncCallback? onStretchTrigger, ShapeBorder? shape, double toolbarHeight, double? leadingWidth, bool? backwardsCompatibility, TextStyle? toolbarTextStyle, TextStyle? titleTextStyle, SystemUiOverlayStyle? systemOverlayStyle})

title: SliverChildBuilderDelegate
introductionEN: A delegate that supplies children for slivers using a builder callback.
introductionCN: 使用构建器回调为 sliver 提供孩子的委托。
constructors: SliverChildBuilderDelegate(NullableIndexedWidgetBuilder builder, {ChildIndexGetter? findChildIndexCallback, int? childCount, bool addAutomaticKeepAlives, bool addRepaintBoundaries, bool addSemanticIndexes, SemanticIndexCallback semanticIndexCallback, int semanticIndexOffset})

title: SliverChildListDelegate
introductionEN: A delegate that supplies children for slivers using an explicit list.
introductionCN: 使用显式列表为 slivers 提供孩子的委托。
constructors: SliverChildListDelegate(List<Widget> children, {bool addAutomaticKeepAlives, bool addRepaintBoundaries, bool addSemanticIndexes, SemanticIndexCallback semanticIndexCallback, int semanticIndexOffset})

title: SliverFixedExtentList
introductionEN: A sliver that places multiple box children with the same main axis extent in a linear array.
introductionCN: 将多个具有相同主轴范围的框子元素放置在线性阵列中的条子。
constructors: SliverFixedExtentList({Key? key, required SliverChildDelegate delegate, required double itemExtent})

title: SliverGrid
introductionEN: A sliver that places multiple box children in a two dimensional arrangement.
introductionCN: 将多个盒子孩子放置在二维排列中的条子。
constructors: SliverGrid({Key? key, required SliverChildDelegate delegate, required SliverGridDelegate gridDelegate})

title: SliverList
introductionEN: A sliver that places multiple box children in a linear array along the main axis.
introductionCN: 沿主轴将多个盒子子项放置在线性阵列中的条子。
constructors: SliverList({Key? key, required SliverChildDelegate delegate})

title: SliverPadding
introductionEN: A sliver that applies padding on each side of another sliver.
introductionCN: 在另一条条子的每一侧应用填充的条子。
constructors: SliverPadding({Key? key, required EdgeInsetsGeometry padding, Widget? sliver})

title: SliverPersistentHeader
introductionEN: A sliver whose size varies when the sliver is scrolled to the edge of the viewport opposite the sliver's GrowthDirection.
introductionCN: 当条子滚动到与条子的生长方向相对的视口边缘时，条子的大小会发生变化。
constructors: SliverPersistentHeader({Key? key, required SliverPersistentHeaderDelegate delegate, bool pinned, bool floating})

title: SliverToBoxAdapter
introductionEN: A sliver that contains a single box widget.
introductionCN: 包含单个框小部件的条子。
constructors: SliverToBoxAdapter({Key? key, Widget? child})
